document.full_text: norway's former marathon world record holder and world champion grete waitz has died at the age of 57, the norwegian athletics federation said tuesday. waitz had been suffering from cancer.
document.title: norwegian marathon great waitz dies at 57
lines_and_colors: norway's former marathon world record holder and world champion grete waitz has died at the age of 57, the norwegian athletics federation said tuesday. waitz had been suffering from cancer.
